page.title: 16SERVICES IN SOUTHILL
page.content: In Southill there are lots of useful services.One of these services is the village store which looks rather like an old house ,but it sells just about everything a middle size store would, because it has to cope with people who can't get out to the town .Other services include buses,post and milk rounds.The buses go through and stop at the memorial in Southill quite regularly.There are three post boxes in Southill and one telephone box.In Southill very few police which go through the village,There is about one patrol car which goes through Southill every seven days.Southill has one pub,The White Horse and is in good business most of the time while it is open to the public.In Southill there is one church, a chapel and one scout and general meeting hut.
